title: Did Bono Say ‘Donald Trump Is Destroying America, We Must Stop Him’?
subtitle: Reports that the U2 frontman proclaimed during an interview that "Donald Trump is destroying America, [and] we must stop him" are fake news.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: During a 'Rolling Stone' interview, U2 singer Bono proclaimed that "Donald Trump is destroying America, [and] we must stop him."
